item.description:
Estimated wine cost is about $15 /person but depends on the number of people attending.
We might open another bottle which would only increase the cost by about $1-$2/person.

** Please bring $15 and some $1 in case the cost changes **


The theme is Merlots from around the World. So if you have a Cheval Blanc, lets taste it!

The agenda is:
o Educational topic - Merlot
o Taste Merlots w/appetizers and chocolate dessert
- French Bordeaux- Right bank- at least 2.
- Chile
- CA Santa Inez Valley
- AU Mollyducker
o AWS News
o Demo- Charlie will demo his new nitrogen system.

ALSO- Remember Chloes restaurant is having a Wine Dinner on Mon, Mar 30th with Victor Hugo from Paso Robles.
Chloe Restaurant

Mike

AWS Meetup Group
item.name: The AWS Wine March Meetup
